descriptionSet.description: A list of the cast and crew of the film.

inscription.text: Tirupati Pictures Combine's Pyaasa Sawan (Eastmancolor) Starring: Jeetendra, Moushumi Chatterjee, Reena Roy, Deven Verma, Madan Puri, Ashalata Supported by: Javed Duggal, Kumar Aditya, N.S. Bedi, Prem Kumar, Umesh Khanna, Ashok Saxena, Babloo, Babban, Raghavaiya, Ashok Shivpuri, Heera, Biully, B.A. Subharao, Verma & Others

Special Appearance: Vinod Mehra, Aruna Irani Produced by Prasan Kapoor Story, Screenplay & Direction Dasari Narayana Rao Music Laxmikant Pyarelal Lyrics Santosh Anand Director of Cinematography M.
